short_summary: Heavy equipment supply, diving, and waste disposal at Maaqtusiis Harbour, Ahousat, BC
description: Tender for heavy equipment supply, diving, and waste disposal at Maaqtusiis Harbour, Ahousat, BC, with specific requirements and attachments available.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Heavy Equipment Supply, Diving and Waste Disposal – Maaqtusiis Harbour, Ahousat, BC**
=====================================================

**Tender Number:** 30003276A
**Tender Closing Date:** November 17, 2022, at 13:00 Hours
**Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of heavy equipment, diving services, and waste disposal at the Maaqtusiis Harbour, Ahousat, BC. This contract will be awarded through a competitive bidding process.

**Scope of Work:**
--------------------------------
The contractor will be responsible for the removal and disposal of waste materials located in the harbour basin of Maaqtusiis Small Craft Harbour. The work will consist of:

* Supply of equipment and personnel for standard heavy marine construction
* Supply of equipment and personnel for a standard diving crew
* Towing and disposal of waste materials

**Contract Requirements:**
-----------------------------

* The contractor must supply all necessary materials and equipment
* The contractor must have a minimum of two million dollars ($5,000,000.00) in marine liability insurance
* The contractor must provide a WCB Clearance Letter in "Good Standing" prior to award
* The contractor must provide a work plan, identifying planned start and end dates, within two weeks of award
* The contractor must inform the owner of planned methodology for completing the work prior to mobilization

**Specifications:**
-------------------

The following specifications are applicable to the contract:

* Equipment and labour: Unit cost per 8-hour weekday, including supply of crew labour, equipment, all accommodations and related expenses
* Diving crew day rate: Unit cost per day, including all crew costs (including food and overnight accommodations), equipment, labour and materials
* Hauling and disposal fee: Cost plus line item, covering disposal and tipping fees generated from the Maaqtusiis Harbour clean-up waste disposal

**Attachments:**
-----------------

The following attachments are available for download:

* Specifications document
* Solicitation document
* Appendices (Addenda)
* Drawings and hydrographic surveys
* Marine insurance policy

**Contact Information:**
------------------------

For further information, please contact:
Karine Plante, Procurement Officer
DFO - Material and Procurement Services
301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6
 Phone: (506) 377
